definitions.text: (chemistry) a surface forming a common boundary between two things (two objects or liquids or chemical phases)
(computer science) a program that controls a display for the user (usually on a computer monitor) and that allows the user to interact with the system
the overlap where two theories or phenomena affect each other or have links with each other
examples: the interface between chemistry and biology

definitions.text: (computer science) computer circuit consisting of the hardware and associated circuitry that links one device with another (especially a computer and a hard disk drive or other peripherals)
